about_the_game:
SLAUGHTER VOID is a brutal, high intensity hack and slasher, combining the best of ARPG and roguelite gameplay with fast-paced combat, varied weapon and ability combinations, and of course loot. An homage to the classic, blood spattered fantasy of the 70's and 80's, SLAUGHTER VOID is a stylish, vicious, and uncompromising experience with an emphasis on speed.

Die fast. Kill faster. 

Features

  • Fast paced, brutal action

    Combat in SLAUGHTER VOID is quick and merciless. A single hit will kill you, but the same goes for (most of) your enemies- speed and aggression are your path to victory here. Hotline Miami meets Diablo in an unrelenting, blood-soaked frenzy.

  • A Wide Range of Implements of Slaughter

    Like any good ARPG, SLAUGHTER VOID places an emphasis on build variety. Combine weapons, abilities, and relics to customize your own personal harbinger of destruction. Hack, slash, pierce, bludgeon, burn (and even kick) your adversaries to pieces.

  • Dynamic Dismemberment

    A quick death is not enough. The faster you kill, the more havoc you wreak upon your foes, severing and splattering them into multiple pieces. The more you slaughter, the more you reap, harvesting valuable bloodstone from their corpses to spend on upgrades, items, and more.

  • To the Victor the Spoils

    Compete to be the fastest on the leaderboards as you carve a bloody, gore-filled path through the void.

  • Endless Ways to Slaughter

    With a wide variety of hand-crafted levels, multiple paths, and a multitude of weapons, abilities, and relics to unlock, spill the blood of your adversaries again and again and again.
